root.name: Defiance
root.description: OverviewDefiance is a game which combines the action of a Third Person Shooting with the scale of a MMO. The game takes place in the Bay Area after the planet has been terraformed.BetaA beta was released exclusively for PSN PlayStation Plus users in Europe on 20th March 2013.PC System RequirementsMinimumProcessorIntel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz CPU or betterVideo Card512MB video card (NVIDIA GeForce 8600, ATI Radeon HD 2900, or Intel HD 4000 integrated graphics or better)Memory2 GB System RAMOSWindows XP SP2HDD Space15 GB free hard drive spaceAdditional InfoSound: DirectX 8.1 compatible sound cardBroadband Internet RequiredRecommendedProcessorIntel Core i5 2.4 GHz CPU or betterVideo Card1024MB video card (NVIDIA GeForce GTS 250 or ATI Radeon HD 4750 or better)Memory4 GB System RAMOSWindows 7HDD Space15 GB free hard drive spaceAdditional InfoSound: DirectX 8.1 compatible sound cardBroadband Internet Required
